abstract: The two sides filed responses to a series of sharp questions raised by Judge Jed S. Rakoff over the propriety of Citigroup’s $285 million settlement with the S.E.C. over mortgage securities.
snippet: The two sides filed responses to a series of sharp questions raised by Judge Jed S. Rakoff over the propriety of Citigroup’s $285 million settlement with the S.E.C. over mortgage securities.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup and the Securities and Exchange Commission filed legal papers on Monday defending their settlement of allegations of fraud in the bank’s sale of mortgage-backed securities.

headline.main: Citigroup and the S.E.C. Defend Their Settlement
